meanings.english_definition: A male given name of Greek origin, related to Cyril.

meanings.definition: Saint Cyril, particularly Saint Cyril of Alexandria or Saint Cyril of Jerusalem.
meanings.english_definition: Referring to either Saint Cyril of Alexandria or Saint Cyril of Jerusalem.

etymology.value: Derived from the Greek name Κύριλλος (Kyrillos), which in turn comes from κύριος (kyrios) meaning "lord".
